mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REQ ( REQ_CD, PRODUCT_CD, PRODUCT_SPECS, PRODUCT_QUANTITY, PRODUCT_ESTIMATION, CONTACT_ADDRESS, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_PHONE, BID_DATE_BEGIN, BID_DATE_END, BID_MAX_LIMIT, BID_STATUS, BID_UID, BID_PRICE, LOGISTICS_CD, LOGISTICS_DESC, LOGISTICS_STATUS, COMMENT, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_AUTHOR, UPDATE_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #{reqCd}, #{productCd}, #{productSpecs}, #{productQuantity}, #{productEstimation}, #{contactAddress}, #{contactName}, #{contactPhone}, #{bidDateBegin}, #{bidDateEnd}, #{bidMaxLimit}, #{bidStatus}, #{bidUid}, #{bidPrice}, #{logisticsCd}, #{logisticsDesc}, #{logisticsStatus}, #{comment}, #{createAuthor}, current_timestamp(), #{updateAuthor}, current_timestamp() )
mapper.update: UPDATE REQ SET PRODUCT_CD = #{productCd}, PRODUCT_SPECS = #{productSpecs}, PRODUCT_QUANTITY = #{productQuantity}, PRODUCT_ESTIMATION = #{productEstimation}, CONTACT_ADDRESS = #{contactAddress}, CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName}, CONTACT_PHONE = #{contactPhone}, BID_DATE_BEGIN = #{bidDateBegin}, BID_DATE_END = #{bidDateEnd}, BID_MAX_LIMIT = #{bidMaxLimit}, BID_STATUS = #{bidStatus}, BID_UID = #{bidUid}, BID_PRICE = #{bidPrice}, LOGISTICS_CD = #{logisticsCd}, LOGISTICS_DESC = #{logisticsDesc}, LOGISTICS_STATUS = #{logisticsStatus}, COMMENT = #{comment}, CREATE_AUTHOR = #{createAuthor}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime}, UPDATE_AUTHOR = #{updateAuthor}, UPDATE_DATETIME = current_timestamp() WHERE UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime} AND REQ_CD = #{reqCd} AND UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime}
mapper.select: SELECT REQ_CD AS "reqCd", PRODUCT_CD AS "productCd", PRODUCT_SPECS AS "productSpecs", PRODUCT_QUANTITY AS "productQuantity", PRODUCT_ESTIMATION AS "productEstimation", CONTACT_ADDRESS AS "contactAddress", CONTACT_NAME AS "contactName", CONTACT_PHONE AS "contactPhone", BID_DATE_BEGIN AS "bidDateBegin", BID_DATE_END AS "bidDateEnd", BID_MAX_LIMIT AS "bidMaxLimit", BID_STATUS AS "bidStatus", BID_UID AS "bidUid", BID_PRICE AS "bidPrice", LOGISTICS_CD AS "logisticsCd", LOGISTICS_DESC AS "logisticsDesc", LOGISTICS_STATUS AS "logisticsStatus", COMMENT AS "comment", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM REQ WHERE REQ_CD = #{reqCd}

SELECT REQ_CD AS "reqCd", PRODUCT_CD AS "productCd", PRODUCT_SPECS AS "productSpecs", PRODUCT_QUANTITY AS "productQuantity", PRODUCT_ESTIMATION AS "productEstimation", CONTACT_ADDRESS AS "contactAddress", CONTACT_NAME AS "contactName", CONTACT_PHONE AS "contactPhone", BID_DATE_BEGIN AS "bidDateBegin", BID_DATE_END AS "bidDateEnd", BID_MAX_LIMIT AS "bidMaxLimit", BID_STATUS AS "bidStatus", BID_UID AS "bidUid", BID_PRICE AS "bidPrice", LOGISTICS_CD AS "logisticsCd", LOGISTICS_DESC AS "logisticsDesc", LOGISTICS_STATUS AS "logisticsStatus", COMMENT AS "comment", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM REQ WHERE REQ_CD = #{reqCd} FOR UPDATE

SELECT REQ_CD AS "reqCd", PRODUCT_CD AS "productCd", PRODUCT_SPECS AS "productSpecs", PRODUCT_QUANTITY AS "productQuantity", PRODUCT_ESTIMATION AS "productEstimation", CONTACT_ADDRESS AS "contactAddress", CONTACT_NAME AS "contactName", CONTACT_PHONE AS "contactPhone", BID_DATE_BEGIN AS "bidDateBegin", BID_DATE_END AS "bidDateEnd", BID_MAX_LIMIT AS "bidMaxLimit", BID_STATUS AS "bidStatus", BID_UID AS "bidUid", BID_PRICE AS "bidPrice", LOGISTICS_CD AS "logisticsCd", LOGISTICS_DESC AS "logisticsDesc", LOGISTICS_STATUS AS "logisticsStatus", COMMENT AS "comment", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM REQ WHERE 1 = 1 AND REQ_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{reqCd}, '%') AND PRODUCT_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{productCd}, '%') AND PRODUCT_SPECS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{productSpecs}, '%') AND PRODUCT_QUANTITY LIKE CONCAT('%', #{productQuantity}, '%') AND PRODUCT_ESTIMATION LIKE CONCAT('%', #{productEstimation}, '%') AND CONTACT_ADDRESS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{contactAddress}, '%') AND CONTACT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{contactName}, '%') AND CONTACT_PHONE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{contactPhone}, '%') AND BID_DATE_BEGIN LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bidDateBegin}, '%') AND BID_DATE_END LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bidDateEnd}, '%') AND BID_MAX_LIMIT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bidMaxLimit}, '%') AND BID_STATUS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bidStatus}, '%') AND BID_UID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bidUid}, '%') AND BID_PRICE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bidPrice}, '%') AND LOGISTICS_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{logisticsCd}, '%') AND LOGISTICS_DESC LIKE CONCAT('%', #{logisticsDesc}, '%') AND LOGISTICS_STATUS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{logisticsStatus}, '%') AND COMMENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{comment}, '%') AND CREATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{createAuthor}, '%') AND UPDATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{updateAuthor}, '%') AND CREATE_DATETIME > #{createDatetime} AND UPDATE_DATETIME > #{updateDatetime} ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart} , ${theFetchSize}

SELECT REQ_CD AS "reqCd", PRODUCT_CD AS "productCd", PRODUCT_SPECS AS "productSpecs", PRODUCT_QUANTITY AS "productQuantity", PRODUCT_ESTIMATION AS "productEstimation", CONTACT_ADDRESS AS "contactAddress", CONTACT_NAME AS "contactName", CONTACT_PHONE AS "contactPhone", BID_DATE_BEGIN AS "bidDateBegin", BID_DATE_END AS "bidDateEnd", BID_MAX_LIMIT AS "bidMaxLimit", BID_STATUS AS "bidStatus", BID_UID AS "bidUid", BID_PRICE AS "bidPrice", LOGISTICS_CD AS "logisticsCd", LOGISTICS_DESC AS "logisticsDesc", LOGISTICS_STATUS AS "logisticsStatus", COMMENT AS "comment", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM REQ WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( ${reqCd} ) AND ( ${productCd} ) AND ( ${productSpecs} ) AND ( ${productQuantity} ) AND ( ${productEstimation} ) AND ( ${contactAddress} ) AND ( ${contactName} ) AND ( ${contactPhone} ) AND ( ${bidDateBegin} ) AND ( ${bidDateEnd} ) AND ( ${bidMaxLimit} ) AND ( ${bidStatus} ) AND ( ${bidUid} ) AND ( ${bidPrice} ) AND ( ${logisticsCd} ) AND ( ${logisticsDesc} ) AND ( ${logisticsStatus} ) AND ( ${comment} ) AND ( ${theSQLCondition} ) ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart} , ${theFetchSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REQ_HT ( REQ_CD, PRODUCT_CD, PRODUCT_SPECS, PRODUCT_QUANTITY, PRODUCT_ESTIMATION, CONTACT_ADDRESS, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_PHONE, BID_DATE_BEGIN, BID_DATE_END, BID_MAX_LIMIT, BID_STATUS, BID_UID, BID_PRICE, LOGISTICS_CD, LOGISTICS_DESC, LOGISTICS_STATUS, COMMENT, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, OPERATION_HISTORY_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( #{reqCd}, #{productCd}, #{productSpecs}, #{productQuantity}, #{productEstimation}, #{contactAddress}, #{contactName}, #{contactPhone}, #{bidDateBegin}, #{bidDateEnd}, #{bidMaxLimit}, #{bidStatus}, #{bidUid}, #{bidPrice}, #{logisticsCd}, #{logisticsDesc}, #{logisticsStatus}, #{comment}, #{createAuthor}, current_timestamp(), 'C' )

INSERT INTO REQ_HT ( REQ_CD, PRODUCT_CD, PRODUCT_SPECS, PRODUCT_QUANTITY, PRODUCT_ESTIMATION, CONTACT_ADDRESS, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_PHONE, BID_DATE_BEGIN, BID_DATE_END, BID_MAX_LIMIT, BID_STATUS, BID_UID, BID_PRICE, LOGISTICS_CD, LOGISTICS_DESC, LOGISTICS_STATUS, COMMENT, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, OPERATION_HISTORY_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( #{reqCd}, #{productCd}, #{productSpecs}, #{productQuantity}, #{productEstimation}, #{contactAddress}, #{contactName}, #{contactPhone}, #{bidDateBegin}, #{bidDateEnd}, #{bidMaxLimit}, #{bidStatus}, #{bidUid}, #{bidPrice}, #{logisticsCd}, #{logisticsDesc}, #{logisticsStatus}, #{comment}, #{createAuthor}, current_timestamp(), 'U' )

INSERT INTO REQ_HT ( REQ_CD, PRODUCT_CD, PRODUCT_SPECS, PRODUCT_QUANTITY, PRODUCT_ESTIMATION, CONTACT_ADDRESS, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_PHONE, BID_DATE_BEGIN, BID_DATE_END, BID_MAX_LIMIT, BID_STATUS, BID_UID, BID_PRICE, LOGISTICS_CD, LOGISTICS_DESC, LOGISTICS_STATUS, COMMENT, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, OPERATION_HISTORY_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( #{reqCd}, #{productCd}, #{productSpecs}, #{productQuantity}, #{productEstimation}, #{contactAddress}, #{contactName}, #{contactPhone}, #{bidDateBegin}, #{bidDateEnd}, #{bidMaxLimit}, #{bidStatus}, #{bidUid}, #{bidPrice}, #{logisticsCd}, #{logisticsDesc}, #{logisticsStatus}, #{comment}, #{createAuthor}, current_timestamp(), 'D' )
